forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 2pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 73. South wind 2 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
